definitions: a form of psychotherapy in which patients act out events from their past

examples.text: the treatment includes art therapy and psychodrama
in the hospital, Hector participated in a psychodrama

shortDefinitions: form of psychotherapy in which patients act out events from their past

definitions: a play, movie, or novel in which psychological elements are the main interest

examples.text: a psychodrama about a brain-warped prisoner-of-war survivor

shortDefinitions: play, film, or novel in which psychological elements are main interest

definitions: the genre to which psychodramatic works belong.
shortDefinitions: genre to which such works belong
